Module: mathsync

mathsync

Exposes module:serialize.
Source:
  • index.js, line 182

<static> summarizer

Exposes the same members of module:summarizer with default settings.

All summarizers provided here use SHA-1 hashing and a bucket selector putting each item in 3 buckets.

Source:
  • index.js, line 136

Methods

<static> summarizer.fromGenerator(generator, serialize) → {summarizer}

Creates summaries representing items yielded by a generator.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
generator external:Generator the generator that will yield all items.
serialize serialize a serializer for yielded items.
Source:
  • index.js, line 163
See:
  • module:summarizer.fromGenerator for customized instances
Returns:
a summarizer returning summaries representing the yielded items.
Type
summarizer

<static> summarizer.fromItems(array, serialize) → {summarizer}

Creates summaries representing an array.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
array Object[] the array of items in the current state.
serialize serialize a serializer for items in the array.
Source:
  • index.js, line 138
See:
  • module:summarizer.fromItems for customized instances
Returns:
a summarizer returning summaries representing the given array.

summarizer

<static> summarizer.fromJSON(producer) → {summarizer}

Deserializes JSON views of summaries, likely obtained throught the network.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
producer function the producer of JSON summaries, returns promises resolving to JSON content.
Source:
  • index.js, line 151
See:
  • module:summarizer.fromJSON for customized instances
Returns:
a summarizer returning deserialized summaries.
Type
summarizer

mathsync

Promise implementation chooser.

Either returns the global Promise object or uses the polyfill.
